name: Comment_isXmlDeclarationTest
description: Unit tests for the isXmlDeclaration method in the Comment class.

test_cases.name: testIsXmlDeclarationTrue
test_cases.description: Tests that the isXmlDeclaration method returns true when the comment data is an XML declaration.

test_cases.name: testIsXmlDeclarationFalse
test_cases.description: Tests that the isXmlDeclaration method returns false when the comment data is not an XML declaration.
